titleStmt.title: The examination of the Accidence by questions and answeres wherein the accidentes of the eight partes of speech are familiarly handled and all difficulties in the same arising explained : whereby young scholers may in shorter time learne to vnderstand, and maisters vvith more ease, and better successe teach the principles of the Accidence, then it vsually happeneth / set forth by T.C.
titleStmt.author: Caudry, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Norton ... in Latine, Greeke, and Hebrue,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Caudry by STC (2nd ed.).
"The Accidence" was first entitled "An introduction of the eyght partes of speche" and later "A short introduction of grammar"--Cf. STC (2nd ed.), vol. 2, p. 63.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
